name: 陳心怡
objective:
本課程在研討課程設計之理論與應用。
This course is designed to develop theory and applications in English curriculum.
schedule:
Week 1-8 Language course design 
Week 9-16 Projects
scorePolicy:
Your grade will be based on the quality of your work in the following areas.

1. Attendance and Participation (10%)
You are expected to attend every class period, do all the assigned readings, and participate in in-class discussion actively.

2. Activities and Assignments (20%) 
There will be several in-class activities and homework assignments throughout the course. 

3. Discussion Leads (10%)
For each class, there will be a few readings which everyone should do. Assigned students will present the readings and lead the discussion for that week. 

4. Final Project and Showcase (30%)
You will design a language course. You will present your course design to the class during the last 2-3 weeks of the semester. The course design portfolio will be due on Week 18.

5. Final Exam (20%)
You will design a course/unit in class.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG5：性別平等（Gender Equality）
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 使用生成式 AI 進行課堂即時互動（Use generative AI for real-time classroom interaction）
